actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 902 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit smoking aboard certain aircraft operating in air transportation.

summary.text: Revises the Federal Aviation Act. Prohibits smoking aboard aircraft operating in air transportation. Provides a fine of not more than $500 for a violation of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 902 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit smoking aboard certain aircraft operating in air transportation.
